channel.title: Feelings on Jessica S. Marquis
channel.description: Recent content in Feelings on Jessica S. Marquis

item.title: days #31-39
item.description: it’s been a long, hard week. lots of driving & busyness, mixed with trying to settle emotions stirred up by all the activity. i don’t tend to be an extremely emotional person, so enduring emotional upheaval is a true test of patience for me. but this unsettlement within me allowed me a window into something i rarely examine: i was able to tune into how i feel about events, behaviors, etc.
